bug.summary: GlobalPooling requiring a mode in v0.50
bug.description: Just tried v0.50, got this error: <denchmark-code>self.pooling = ME.MinkowskiGlobalPooling() TypeError: __init__() missing 1 required positional argument: 'mode' </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: Had to resort to using: <denchmark-code>self.pooling = ME.MinkowskiGlobalMaxPooling() </denchmark-code>
